Car_api¶

class Car_apiCar_api(cdb.Model)¶

This file communicates with the car table in the database

__init__(self,strict=True,**kwargs)¶

It is a constructor to initialize the values to the variables

Fetch all the cars from the database

Change the availability of the cars
